member.name: DVEXTENTINFO
member.summary: Represents the sizing data used in .

member.name: DVEXTENTINFO.cb
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: DVEXTENTINFO.dwExtentMode
member.summary: Indicates whether the sizing mode is content or integral sizing. See the enumeration for possible values.

member.name: DVEXTENTINFO.sizelProposed
member.summary: The proposed size in content sizing or the preferred size in integral sizing.
